question_content.barrons:question: After the devastating eruption, fear of Mount Etna was great: people did not return to cultivate its rich hillside lands until the volcano had been ________ for two years.
question_content.barrons:explanation:
dormant; quiescent.

People naturally would fear the vicinity of an actively erupting volcano and would stay away from the area until the volcano had been quiescent (at rest) or dormant (inactive) for some time.

Flagrant is incorrect. Flagrant means blatant or outrageous. It makes no sense in the context.

Pungent is incorrect. Pungent means acrid-tasting or strong-smelling. It makes no sense in the context.

Inchoate is incorrect. Inchoate means undeveloped or not fully formed. It makes no sense in the context.

Dilatory is incorrect. Dilatory means tardy or tending to delay. It makes no sense in the context.
